subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. A. Happ agreed to a three-year, $36 million contract with the Toronto Blue Jays, returning to the team he pitched for from 2012 to 2014.
snippet: J. A. Happ agreed to a three-year, $36 million contract with the Toronto Blue Jays, returning to the team he pitched for from 2012 to 2014.
